    • Method Detail

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(javax.jms.Message message)
        The onMessage override the standard method. Message contains a CrashPacket. When a REQUEST packet is received, a DB copy is sent. When a UNLOCKGLOBAL packet is received, the RM must release his token. When a LOCKRESPONSE packet is received, the RM (surely in crash, collect the token) When a UNLOCKREQUEST packet is received the RM release the token. Else it is in the case where the RM collect the DB received.
        Specified by:
        onMessage in interface javax.jms.MessageListener
        Parameters:
        message -
